This Rmarkdown file contains code for reading in and cleaning the raw dataset.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
asthma_df <- readr::read_csv('./Data/Air_Quality.csv')
```

```{r}
asthma_df %>% 
  group_by(year_description) %>% 
  summarize(counts = n())
```
